text: tavu helillavendu avaru allahana ane haki heluttare. Nijavagi avaru dhikkarada matannu heliddare hagu avaru muslimarada balika dhikkarigalagiddare. Avaru, tamage sadhisalagaddannu (dutara hatyeyannu) yojisiddaru. Nijavagi avaru, allah mattu avana dutaru tam'ma audaryadinda avarannu sampannagolisiddakkagiyaste pratikaravesagiruvaru. Idiga avaru pascattapa pattare avarige hitavaditu. Avaru tiruginintare allahanu avarige i lokadallu paralokadallu bahala kathina sikse niduvanu. Bhumiyalli avarige raksakanagi hagu sahayakanagi yaru sigalararu
